    Automation Solutions

    Our Automation Solutions business enables the greatest use of the world's most valuable resources, ensuring the performance and safety of industries that are the backbone of daily life.

    Discover More

    Commercial & Residential Solutions

    Discover More Discover More

    Commercial & Residential Solutions

    Our Commercial & Residential Solutions business helps ensure human comfort and health, protect food quality and safety, advance energy efficiency and create sustainable infrastructure.

    Discover More

    Commercial & Residential Solutions

    Driven without compromise to address the world's most critical needs, we show customers that, no matter the challenge, they can Consider It Solved™.

    Igniting Innovation

    Learn More

    Smarter Grids

    New approaches to deliver cleaner power to more people.

    Learn More

    Learn More

    Safer Food

    Connected monitoring devices preserve food safety and quality from farm to fork.

    Learn More

    Secure Solutions

    Reassurance that critical data is protected online and offline.

    Learn More

    Contractor Confidence

    Smart tools empower skilled tradespeople to achieve new levels of success.

    Learn More

    Cleaner Energy

    Automation technologies to make the most of clean, cost-effective liquefied natural gas.

    Learn More

    Building Control

    Precise solutions to keep everyone in the office comfortable.

    Inspiring the Next Generation of STEM

    Innovation, ingenuity and an insatiable love of learning will fuel the next generation of leaders in STEM. Through our “We Love STEM” program, we’re inspiring tomorrow’s leaders to experience the excitement of STEM today.

    We Love STEM

    Careers at Emerson

    Across the globe, our employees are united by a common cause: leaving the world in a better place than we found it. We believe in supporting our people – a core value – as they combine their talents to bring inspiration to life.

    Latest News

    View All News & Events

    Corporate News

    Emerson Named ‘Industrial IoT Company of the Year’ for Third Year in a Row

    Emerson has been named the “Industrial IoT Company of the Year” by IoT Breakthrough for an unprecedented third consecutive year.
    Jan 3, 2020
    read more

    Corporate News

    Emerson in the News: Newsweek Ranks Emerson Among America’s Most Responsible Companies

    Emerson has been named among America’s Most Responsible Companies by Newsweek and research firm Statista. The ranking involved an assessment of America’s largest companies on a variety of environmental, social and corporate governance categories.
    Dec 2, 2019
    read more

    Corporate News

    Emerson Completes Acquisition of Zedi’s Software and Automation Businesses

    Emerson announced it has completed the purchase of Zedi’s software and automation businesses.
    Jul 8, 2019
    read more
